constituent: harvest, wheat, cereal, radio caroline, flowers, vessels, turkey, crotch
heisigStory: Wheat . . . flowers . . . vessels. Compare frames 756 and 757 for the right side.
koohiiStory1: The harvest of genetically modified crops is taken onboard the Greenpeace vessel (see the flower vessel in safeguard (#700)).
koohiiStory2: Wheat is harvested; the grain (flower) is put into vessels for shipping.
myStory: chữ Hoạch. thu hoạch, gặt, cắt lúa. khi hoa chim chạy quanh cây lúa là thu hoạch
